parameters.name: IncludeComponents
parameters.description: True to make components compatible with 3DExperience, false to not

parameters.name: Result
parameters.description: True if model successfully made compatible with 3DExperience, false if not

title: IModelDocExtension.Make3DExperienceCompatible
description: Makes the current model compatible with SOLIDWORKS Design Augmented.
signature:
void Make3DExperienceCompatible( 
   System.Boolean
IncludeComponents
,
   out System.Boolean
Result
)

parameters.name: IncludeComponents
parameters.description: True to make components compatible with 3DExperience, false to not

parameters.name: Result
parameters.description: True if model successfully made compatible with 3DExperience, false if not
